attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Support the government's decision for Road Pricing and any other means to reduce the traffic on our roads and therefore congestion and importantly CO2 emissions however the funds raised should be designated for improving public transport and even reducing the cost of using public transport. It should be FREE to attract more use but it must be expanded and improved.

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence from "Colin D. Hills" to a clear action for HM Government. You also need to be more explicit in the aims of your petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
